title: E=M6 Family
overview: Between preconceived ideas and real scientific discoveries, E=M6 Family is an opportunity for young and old to learn while having fun! Everyday inventions, food secrets, the importance of hygiene or even the amazing life of animals, science can be child's play, and this is what Mac Lesggy will explain to GaÃ«lle Marie through fascinating topics. Together, they will explore our society through scientific experiments accessible to all! E=M6 offers itself a Family version to bring together children and parents.
